0pt; text-align: right;"><span></span></p></footer></section><section class="docx" style="padding: 72pt; min-height: 841.9pt;"><header style="margin-top: calc(-39.2667px); min-height: calc(39.2667px);"><p class="docx_header"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/05cde0cb-a47a-41c5-ace9-a1ca98cdd70c" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"></div><span style="font-family: Arial;">                         </span><span>业务需求分析过程</span><p></p></header><article><p class="docx_heading1 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc23899"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; min-height: 22pt; font-size: 22pt;">1.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">上海证券交易所和香港联合交易所将允许两地投资者通过当地证券公司</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">(</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">或经纪商</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">)</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">买卖规定范围内的对方交易所上市的股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">和股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">沪港通包括沪股通和港股通两部分：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">沪股通，是指投资者委托香港经纪商，经由香港联合交易所设立的证券交易服务公司，向上海证券交易所进行申报</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">(</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">买卖盘传递</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">)</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，买卖规定范围内的上海证券交易所上市的股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">和股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港股通，是指投资者委托内地证券公司，经由上海证券交易所设立的证券交易服务公司，向香港联合交易所进行申报</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">(</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">买卖盘传递</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">)</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，买卖规定范围内的香港联合交易所上市的股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">和股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9298"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">1.1</span><span>目的</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">针对港股通进行业务设计，使资产管理系统可支持港股通业务。</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc25942"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">1.2</span><span>范围</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">港股通联合市场：可投资股票、</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">ETF</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc26882"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">1.3</span><span>读者对象</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">项目经理、公司高层管理、参与该项目的项目组成员以及</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">PPQA</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc12417"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">1.4</span><span>参考文档</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">《港股通结算业务市场参与人技术实施指引（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">1.01</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">.doc</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">》</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">《港股通登记结算业务介绍</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">20140618</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">（现场培训）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">.ppt</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">》</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">《港股通结算业务市场参与人技术实施指引（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">V1.03</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">.pdf</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">》</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc11886"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">1.5</span><span>术语定义</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港股通，是指投资者委托内地证券公司，经由上交所设立的证券交易服务公司（上交所</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">SPV</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">），向香港联合交易所进行申报（买卖盘传递），买卖规定范围内的香港联合交易所上市的股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">和股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p></article><footer style="margin-bottom: calc(-29.8667px); min-height: calc(29.8667px);"><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN">[</span><span lang="zh-CN">键入文字</span><span lang="zh-CN">]</span></p><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: right;"><span></span></p></footer></section><section class="docx" style="padding: 72pt; min-height: 841.9pt;"><header style="margin-top: calc(-39.2667px); min-height: calc(39.2667px);"><p class="docx_header"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/5c803cee-6379-4bd7-a25f-d3a971a73d19" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"></div><span style="font-family: Arial;">                         </span><span>业务需求分析过程</span><p></p></header><article><p class="docx_heading1 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc5018"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; min-height: 22pt; font-size: 22pt;">2.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">系统说明</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc29355"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.1</span><span>业务介绍</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">境内投资者买卖香港证券市场的股票</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，以港币报价，以人民币作为支付货币，由中国结算通过市场化原则建立相应机制解决内地投资者以人民币直接买卖港交所挂牌证券的货币转换问题。</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc26475"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.2</span><span>业务流程</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc23100"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.2.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">交易流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 432.45pt; height: 288.55pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/a5572cf2-352b-4cb0-af6a-4e79476beb2a" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 432.45pt; height: 288.55pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc14791"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.2.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">结算与交收机制</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 431.8pt; height: 191.25pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/852dfc5c-1353-40a7-bc97-828e2e0b3ef0" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 431.8pt; height: 191.25pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">按香港市场的规则：中国结算与香港结算的证券及资金在</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">进行交收</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">中国结算与香港结算以港币进行交收；并与其参与者以人民币进行交收；中国结算于香港进行人民币与港币之间的兑换</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">投资者与结算参与者亦以人民币进行交收</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc12704"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.3</span><span>业务中的用户与角色</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">内地结算参与人：上交所会员券商。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">内地投资者：分为机构投资者和个人投资者。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">中国结算：中国证券登记结算有限公司，是内地投资者的名义持有人，是香港结算的一个参与人。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">香港结算：香港中央结算有限公司与中国结算一样，不对证券托管。</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">香港结算在系统中维护中国结算持有，不记录境内投资者明细，中国结算维护境内投资者持有明细数据，持有汇总数据与香港结算每日对账。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港交所：香港证券交易所。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">香港结算代理人：是香港结算的下属公司，是上市公司的股票名义持有人。</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">列示在港股上市公司股东名册上，中国结算及作为权益拥有人的内地投资者不列示在股东名册上。</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc2903"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.4</span><span>业务范围</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港股普通交易（股票</span><span lang="null" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">权证</span><span lang="null" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">）、红利发放业务、风控资金业务、证券组合费清算、股份拆分与合并</span><span lang="null" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">现金收购、股份收购</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、供股、配股</span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc27736"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.5</span><span>业务遵循标准或规范</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.8pt; margin-left: 39.3pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc10520"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">2.6</span><span>业务的外延关系</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc5378"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">交易货币</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">境内投资者买卖香港证券市场的股票</span><span lang="null" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">股票</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">ETF</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，以</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港币报价，以人民币作为支付货币</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 396.75pt; height: 133.5pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/737dfc0c-bde1-449c-a029-8d0c149d41e3" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 396.75pt; height: 133.5pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc26226"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">汇率</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">参考汇率</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">：</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">中国结算开盘前向本所提供当日参考汇率，由本所转发至会员。</span><span style="font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"> </span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">结算汇率</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">：由中国结算在香港与商业银行确定当日清算汇率，确定投资者的清算金额，两日后按照当日折算价进行交付。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">具体汇率结算方式：</span><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">中国结算。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc32647"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">交易日历安排</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">最小交集：初期，仅在沪港两地均为交易日且能够满足结算安排时开通</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非交易非交收日：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">境内放假、香港放假；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">香港的半日市</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">半天交易，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">资金不交收、证券交收</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，港股通市场和香港保持一致；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非对称节假日：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">由于境内放假香港不放假，为避免境内放假期间造成资金交收违约，境内放假前两天</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">在</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">港股通</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">日历优化后可作为</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">交易日</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">但是需要预付结算备付金；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">恶劣天气：遇</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">台风黑雨</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">影响</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">交易交收</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">9</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点前发布，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">12</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点前解除，资金、证券正常交收；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">9</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点前发布，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">12</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点未解除，资金、证券均不交收；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">9</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">~10</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">30</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">发布，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">12</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点未解除，资金不交收，证券交收；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">10</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">30</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">后发布，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">12</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">点未解除，二批资金不交收，证券交收</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-22-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非对称节假日前两个交易日：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">指交易当日至其对应的港股交收日（含）期间，至少有一日为内地节假日且为香港地区非节假日的内地与香港市场共同交易日。需要预付结算备付金。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451pt; height: 183.2pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/74e38707-1885-4a7d-9880-b7dbbdbb6c18" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451pt; height: 183.2pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc25932"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.4</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">预付款及退款</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">模式</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">新增港股通交易日的交易资金清算交收。参与新增交易日资金结算业务的境内结算参与人，应以备付金账户为单位，计算新增交易日应提前到账资金金额（涵盖经纪、自营及托管类业务），并于交易当日 </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">17:00 </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">前足额划付（或留存）至其结算备付金账户。应提前到账资金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">当日交易买卖轧差应付金额（含税费）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">×</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">资金提前到账调整系数。资金提前到账调整系数由中国结算发布。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">当日交易买卖轧差应付金额（含税费），</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">为港股通交易（买清算金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">卖清算金额）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">&gt;0</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的情况。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">资金提前到账调整系数，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">为中登提供一般为</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1.1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，汇率波动比例。</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: bold; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2.6.4.1</span><span lang="en-US">银行结算模式</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 450.9pt; height: 349.75pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/04611afa-fe5d-4a9d-a258-4ed4feda3b7b" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 450.9pt; height: 349.75pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">预付款指令金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">净应付（未含费用）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">中登系数</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">费用系数</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">(</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">大于</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1)</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">预付款指令金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">净应付（未含费用）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（中登系数</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">+</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">费用系数（小于</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1)</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">净应付（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">未</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">含费用）为港股通交易（买金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">卖金额）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">&gt;0</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的情况。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">费用系数建议每个托管行保持一致，为费用占预付款比率。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US">两种退款模式：</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>1</span><span>次回冲：</span><span lang="en-US">T+2</span><span lang="en-US">港股通交收日回冲</span><span lang="en-US">1</span><span lang="en-US">次</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">回冲金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span>预付款</span><span>-</span><span>日终实际净应付</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>2</span><span>次回冲</span><span lang="null">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>首次回冲：</span><span>预付款</span><span>-ROUNDUP</span><span>（日终实际净应付</span><span>*</span><span>中登系数，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>第二次回冲：</span><span>ROUNDUP</span><span>（日终实际净应付</span><span>*</span><span>中登系数，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span><span>-</span><span>日终实际净应付</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span></span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: bold; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2.6.4.2</span><span lang="en-US">券商结算模式</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 450.75pt; height: 351.85pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/6174fb16-daa6-4191-b7de-4aa42f7d6d2e" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 450.75pt; height: 351.85pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">目前券商港股通预付款可区分为以下情况：</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">情况</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">：全部由券商垫付，无需进行预付款划付。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">情况</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">：超出实际结算金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">(</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">系数</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，多冻结的部分</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">)</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">券商不垫付，只垫付实际结算金额部分。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">情况</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">：券商均不垫付，全部由管理人预付。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc21860"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.5</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">风险措施</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>结算参与人未完成资金提前到账义务的，中国结算将从交易当日起按自然日向结算参与人收取违约金，并收取垫付资金的利息，直至结算参与人将足额资金交付中国结算；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>违约金</span><span>=</span><span>未完成提前到账资金缺口</span><span>×1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">‰</span><span>× </span><span>违约天数</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>垫息</span><span>=</span><span>未完成提前到账资金缺口</span><span>×</span><span>垫资利率</span><span>×</span><span>违约天数</span><span>/360</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span>如果中国结算动用境外银行授信的，还将向结算参与人分摊银行授信的利息成本</span><span lang="null">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="null">结算参与人于下一港股通交易日日终前仍未补足的，中国结算有权暂停其港股通全部或者部分结算业务资格，并通知上交所或者深交所暂停接受相关证券账户的港股通买入申报。</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="null">对于经纪业务或者自营业务，暂停接受相关交易所会员全部自营证券账户的港股通买入申报；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="null">对于托管业务，中国结算根据结算参与人申报，暂停接受所申报证券账户的港股通买入申报。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc17297"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">2.6.6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">税费</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">交易类：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-23-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">证券交易</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">印花税：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">香港</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">印花税署征收；按成交金额</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.1%</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">双边收取</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">。</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（取整到元，不足一元</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">按一元计）</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">；</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对于港股通</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ETF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，暂免征收。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-23-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">非交易过户印花税：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">香港</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">印花税署征收；</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对于港股通股票，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">按转让股份上一港股通交易日收盘市值的</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.1%</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">双边收取</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">。（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">取整到元，不足一元</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">按一元计</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">采用当日参考汇率卖出价换算成人民币收取，四舍五入取整到元，并根据实际换汇汇率多退少补</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）；</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对于港股通</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ETF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，暂免征收。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-23-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易征费：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; 10.5pt;">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.00</span><span lang="en-US" min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">双边收取，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">四舍五入至小数点后两位</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt;">的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.005</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">65</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">非交易过户费</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">：</span><span lang="en-US" lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">折算为人民币收取（四舍五入取整到元），最高上限</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">10</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">万元人民币（双向收取）。（换汇汇率</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">采用上一港股通交易日结算汇兑比率</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）；对于港股通</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ETF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">100</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">元</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">/</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">笔（双向收取），暂免收取</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-23-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">财汇局交易征费：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">会计及财务汇报局</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">征收；</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">按成交金额（港币）的 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.00015%</span><span margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">质押登记费：对于港股通股票，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1‰</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">收取，超</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">500</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">万港元市值的部分按该部分市值（港币）的</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">‰</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: font-size: 10.5pt;">，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">500</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">万港币市值以下（含）部分按该部分市值（港币）的</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.5‰</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">收取，超</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">500</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">万港元市值的部分按该部分市值（港币）的</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.05‰</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">收取；以上一港股通交易日收盘市值作为基础换算成人民币计收（四舍五入取整到元），换算汇率采用上一港股通</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易日结算汇兑比率。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-10-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">结算类：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-31-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">股份交收费：香港结算征收；按成交金额</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0.002%</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">双边收取（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">四舍五入至小数点后两位</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，最低及最高收费分别为</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">元及</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">100</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">元</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-20-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">证券组合费：香港结算征收；</span><span lang="en-US" font-size: 14pt;">2.6.11</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">交易市场</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="color: rgb(0, 0, rgb(0, 0, 0);">。</span></p></article><footer style="margin-bottom: calc(-29.8667px); min-height: calc(29.8667px);"><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span class="docx_header"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/684978e2-096e-4248-9e55-a0dcb224fea7" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"></div><span style="font-family: Arial;">                         </span><span>业务需求分析过程</span><p></p></header><article><p class="docx_heading1 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc27173"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; min-height: 22pt; font-size: 22pt;">3.</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">功能性</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">需求分析</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc20498"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.1</span><span>交易佣金</span><span lang="en-US">计算</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc24161"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.1.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易数据处理为中国结算上海分公司提供，除佣金之外各交易费用都已提供。人民币佣金算法公式</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">成交金额</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇率</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金利率。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc12576"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.1.2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">用户接口</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc17936"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.1.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">系统根据设置的清算综合参数或者【交易佣金设置】来计算港股通佣金。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span 10.5pt;">=sum( round(round</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-round(SYF *WBHL</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，保留位数）</span><span lang="en-US" 10.5pt;">，保留位数）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">....,2))</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-0"><span>参数</span><span>值</span><span>=</span><span>申请编号</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span>当交易</span><span>佣金设置中，</span><span>【</span><span docx-num-14-0"><span>参数</span><span>值</span><span>=</span><span>成交汇总</span><span lang="en-US">_</span><span lang="en-US">原币</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span>当交易</span><span>佣金设置中，</span><span>【</span><span lang="en-US">佣金计算公式</span><span>】</span><span>=</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span>当交易</span><span>佣金设置中，</span><span>【</span><span lang="en-US">佣金计算公式</span><span>】</span><span>=</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span lang="en-US">计算本币佣金’且</span><span>【</span><span>本币</span><span>金额精度】</span><span>!</span><span>=0</span><span>时</span><span>，</span><span>佣金金额</span><span>=round</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（</span><span>成交金额之和</span><span>×</span><span>汇率，</span><span>本币金额精度</span><span>）</span><span>×</span><span>佣金率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span>当交易</span><span>佣金设置中，【</span><span lang="en-US">佣金计算公式</span><span>】</span><span>=</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span lang="en-US">优先计算原币佣金’</span><span>时</span><span>，</span><span>佣金金额</span><span>=round</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（</span><span>成交金额之和</span><span>×</span><span>佣金率，</span><span lang="en-US">原</span><span>币金额精度</span><span>）</span><span>×</span><span>汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=round(sum(WBJE)*WBHL*</span><span lang="en-US"
