lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ZQL_ZGF+ZQL_JYF+ZQL_GHF+ZQL_JSF+ZQL_QTF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-2-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数值</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span>成交汇总</span><span lang="en-US">_</span><span lang="en-US">本币</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-5-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=roun</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">d(</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">本币成交金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金利率，</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ZQL_ZGF+ZQL_JYF+ZQL_GHF+ZQL_JSF+ZQL_QTF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-2-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数值</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span>成交汇总</span><span lang="en-US">_</span><span lang="en-US">原币（工行算法）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-26-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 41.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=round(sum(WBJE)*WBHL*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金利率</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">,2)- </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ZQL_ZGF+ZQL_JYF+ZQL_GHF+ZQL_JSF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-2-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数值</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">成交明细、申请编号汇总</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-5-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>佣金金额</span><span>=</span><span>sum</span><span>（同属一个申请编号</span><span lang="null">（</span><span>round</span><span>（港币成交金额</span><span>×</span><span>汇率</span><span>×</span><span>佣金率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span><span lang="null">）</span><span>）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ZQL_ZGF+ZQL_JYF+ZQL_GHF+ZQL_JSF+ZQL_QTF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-2-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数值</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">先明细换汇，再按委托编号汇总计算</span><span lang="en-US">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">买入截位卖出进位</span><span lang="en-US">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">先明细换汇保留两位小数，买入成交金额换汇时向下舍去保留两位小数，即</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">rounddown(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币明细成交金额</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">不含费用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">)*</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇率，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）计算；卖出成交金额换汇时向上入保留两位小数，即</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">roundup(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币明细成交金额</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">不含费用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">)*</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇率，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）计算。再按委托编号</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">wtbh</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇总</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">为计费基准</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，按</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">round</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">sum</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（计费基准&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金费率），</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金保留位数</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）计算纯佣金</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-2-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数值</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">先明细换汇，再按委托编号汇总计算</span><span lang="en-US">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">买入卖出四舍五入</span><span lang="en-US">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">先明细换汇保留两位小数，即</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">round(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币明细成交金额</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">(</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">不含费用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">)*</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇率，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）计算</span><span lang="null" style="min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">再按委托编号</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">wtbh</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇总</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">为计费基准</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">，按</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">round</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">sum</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（计费基准&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">*&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金费率），</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金保留位数</span><span style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）计算纯佣金</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-0"><span>参数</span><span>值</span><span>=</span><span>成交汇总</span><span lang="en-US">_</span><span lang="en-US">原币（建信算法）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-14-1"><span>佣金金额</span><span>=round</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（</span><span>成交金额之和</span><span>×</span><span>汇率，</span><span>本币金额精度</span><span>）</span><span>×</span><span>佣金率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc24015"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.1.5</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">其他逻辑</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">当</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">【</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易佣金设置</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">】</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">的“</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金计算公式</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">”</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">所含费用</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;"> </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">BUG 496082 </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-34-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">清算</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">参数</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">“</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">港股通佣金明细汇总计算方式</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">”</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">只控制</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">纯</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">佣金的计算，所需扣减的费用由</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">【包含费用】字段中已勾选的费用来判断。当包含费用</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体;">=</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">其他费，则在佣金计算时需扣减其他费。而包含费用未勾选其他费，则不需要扣减其他费。</span></p><p class="docx_listparagraph docx-num-34-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Calibri;">尤其针对于算法</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">“</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">成交汇总</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体;">_</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">本币</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">”</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">、</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">“</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">成交汇总</span><span style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体;">_</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">原币</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">”</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">，在算法公式中默认会扣减其他费。而当</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">“</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">佣金计算公式</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Calibri;">”</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">佣金</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">所含费用</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">’</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">时，是否扣除其他费也应受【包含费用】字段控制。</span><span style="font-family: Calibri;">若包含费用未勾选其他费，则在计算中不需要默认扣减其他费。若包含费用勾选了其他费，则在计算中需扣减其他费。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Calibri, 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc4859"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.2</span><span>股票交易业务</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc29523"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">由中国结算上海分公司提供交易数据，经过清算处理后生产股票交易业务数据。数据处理暂定方案为成交金额、交易费用、交易佣金为港币金额，清算金额为人民币金额，因此维护的交易账户信息中结转现金账户为人民币账户。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc13090"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">用户接口</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 441pt; height: 325.2pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/d5417b39-3583-4242-8bcc-8d8460a8ced0" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 441pt; height: 325.2pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc28639"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.3</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">港股通结算明细文件清算交易数据至【股票交易业务】。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc10525"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.4</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">清算综合参数</span></p><table style="width: 435.4pt; table-layout: auto; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 75.5pt;"><col style="width: 178.8pt;"><col style="width: 181.1pt;"></colgroup><tbody><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(230, 224, 236); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">参数代码</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(230, 224, 236); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">参数名</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(230, 224, 236); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">参数值</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">CO_M2_CG_GGT</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">上交所港股通本币成交金额计算方式</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">明细</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">计算</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">默认值</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">汇总计算</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、成本倒减尾差进成本</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">4</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、成本倒减尾差进费用</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">5</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、成本倒减尾差进费用（逐条计算）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">6</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、成本倒减尾差进费用（中间过程保留</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">位小数）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">7</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、买入截位卖出进位</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">8</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、成本倒减尾差进费用（根据申请编号汇总计算）</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">CO_M2_CG_FEE_BLWSMS</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal docx-num-8-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">四舍五入（默认值）</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-8-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">截位</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: font-size: 10.5pt;">CO_GGTHLWCBCLDYQSXW</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港股通汇率尾差不处理对应券商席位</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">招商证券</span><span style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">外包</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"> </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">新增的参数</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">默认为空，加载系统【交易渠道设置】</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">CO_HSGT_CBDJWCJFY_SQBHZJJS</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">沪深港通成本倒减尾差进费用（根据申请编号汇总计算）对于证券其他费的中间计算保留位数</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(20, 20, 20); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">整数，用户手工输入，默认不保留</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">算法公式详细逻辑：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>1</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">明细计算</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=sum</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（原币成交金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>））</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>各费用本币金额</span><span>=</span><span>IF </span><span>【交易费用设置】截位方式</span><span>=</span><span>截位</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">  </span><span>OR </span><span>（【交易费用设置】截位方式不存在或为空</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>and </span><span>清算参数</span><span lang="null">“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”</span><span>=</span><span>截位）</span><span>THEN</span><span lang="en-US"> </span><span>sum</span><span>（</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>rounddown</span><span>（</span><span>原币交易费用金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率</span><span>，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span><span>）</span><span>ELSE</span><span lang="en-US"> </span><span>sum</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（原币交易费用金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>））</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">清算参数“</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港股通汇率尾差不处理对应券商席位</span><span lang="en-US">”的参数值能对应匹配到流水的席位，则证券其他费默认为</span><span lang="en-US">0</span><span lang="en-US">；“</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港股通汇率尾差不处理对应券商席位</span><span lang="en-US">”的参数值不能对应匹配到流水的席位</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">或</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">无该参数，则：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>买入本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>卖出本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>2</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">汇总计算</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=round</span><span>（</span><span>sum</span><span>（原币成交金额）</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>各费用本币金额</span><span>=</span><span>IF </span><span>【交易费用设置】截位方式</span><span>=</span><span>截位</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">  </span><span>OR </span><span>（【交易费用设置】截位方式不存在或为空</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>and </span><span>清算参数</span><span lang="null">“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”</span><span>=</span><span>截位）</span><span>THEN rounddown</span><span>（</span><span>sum</span><span>（原币交易费用金额）</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span><span>ELSE</span><span lang="en-US"> </span><span>round</span><span>（</span><span>sum</span><span>（原币交易费用金额）</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>买入本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>卖出本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">3</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">成本倒减尾差进成本</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span lang="en-US">+</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">其中，费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>买入本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">0</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>卖出本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">0</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">4</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">成本倒减尾差进费用</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">先计算证券其他费，再计算本币成交金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">证券其他费</span><span lang="en-US">=round</span><span>（</span><span lang="en-US">sum(</span><span lang="en-US">各项费用原币</span><span lang="en-US">)</span><span lang="en-US">*</span><span lang="en-US">交易费率，</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span>）</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span><span lang="null">，</span><span lang="en-US">费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span lang="en-US">+</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">5</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">成本倒减尾差进费用（逐条计算）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">本币</span><span lang="en-US">成交金额：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a.</span><span lang="en-US">计算除佣金外的所有费用之和</span><span lang="en-US">，</span><span lang="en-US">按如下计算：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a1.</span><span lang="en-US">逐条计算明细费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">明细汇总</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">round</span><span>（</span><span lang="en-US">各项费用原币合计</span><span lang="en-US">*</span><span lang="en-US">交易费率，</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a2.</span><span lang="en-US">多条数据汇总计算</span><span lang="en-US">，</span><span lang="en-US">汇总费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US">费用</span><span lang="en-US">合计</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">sum</span><span lang="en-US">（明细汇总）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">b.</span><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;">  </span><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span lang="en-US">+</span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">证券其他费：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a.</span><span lang="en-US">计算除佣金外的所有费用之和</span><span lang="en-US">，</span><span lang="en-US">按如下计算：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a1.</span><span lang="en-US">逐条计算明细费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">明细汇总</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">round</span><span>（</span><span lang="en-US">各项费用原币合计</span><span lang="en-US">*</span><span lang="en-US">交易费率，</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span>）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a2.</span><span lang="en-US">多条数据汇总计算</span><span lang="en-US">，</span><span lang="en-US">汇总费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">sum</span><span lang="en-US">（明细汇总）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">b.</span><span lang="en-US">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计</span><span lang="en-US">，即</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">c.</span><span lang="en-US">其他费轧差计算获得</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">6</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">成本倒减尾差进费用（中间过程保留</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span lang="en-US">位小数）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span lang="en-US">+</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">证券其他费</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span>sum</span><span>（</span><span>round</span><span>（原币交易费用金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>））</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">7</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">成本倒减尾差进费用（根据申请编号汇总计算）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">先计算证券其他费，再计算本币成交金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">a.</span><span lang="en-US">计算除佣金外的所有费用之和</span><span lang="en-US">,</span><span lang="en-US">按如下计算：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;">      </span><span lang="en-US">a1.</span><span lang="en-US">先根据申请编号汇总后，逐条计算明细费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">明细汇总</span><span lang="en-US">=Round(sum(</span><span>原币交易费用金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率</span><span lang="en-US">),2)</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;">      </span><span lang="en-US">a2.</span><span lang="en-US">多条数据汇总计算</span><span lang="en-US">，</span><span lang="en-US">汇总费用之和：</span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">sum</span><span lang="en-US">（明细汇总）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">b.</span><span lang="en-US">折算成人民币后的交易费用合计，即</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">c.</span><span lang="en-US">其他费轧差计算获得</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span lang="en-US">= </span><span lang="en-US">费用合计</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">注：</span><span lang="en-US">a1</span><span lang="en-US">步骤中每笔费用乘汇率的保留位数由参数</span><span lang="en-US">“</span><span lang="en-US">沪深港通成本倒减尾差进费用（根据申请编号汇总计算）对于证券其他费的中间计算保留位数</span><span lang="en-US">”</span><span lang="en-US">控制，默认不保留位数</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span lang="en-US">+</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">8</span><span>、参数值</span><span>=</span><span lang="en-US">买入截位卖出进位</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">买入</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=sum</span><span>（</span><span>rounddown</span><span>（人民币应收付金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>））</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">卖出</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>=sum</span><span>（</span><span>roundup</span><span>（人民币应收付金额</span><span>*</span><span>交易汇率，</span><span>2</span><span>））</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>买入本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>卖出本币轧差其他费用</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>= </span><span>本币成交金额</span><span>-</span><span>人民币应收付金额</span><span>-</span><span>各费用本币金额</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">其中，费用的保留小数位数及保留位数方式的进位截位逻辑为优先取【交易费用设置】里面的截位方式，取不到再取清算综合参数“上交所港股通本币费用保留位数模式”设置的值。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc17199"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.5</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">核算综合参数</span></p><table style="width: 435.4pt; table-layout: auto; margin-left: auto; margin-right: class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="null">以下核算项目本币金额，汇率取值通过核算综合参数的来控制。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9994"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.2.6</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; 12pt;">股票买入</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">投资分类</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易类</span><span rgb(0, 0, 0);">人民币</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>交易费用</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>人民币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>交易费用</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>/</span><span>应付佣金</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>原币</span><span>*</span><span>汇率</span><span lang="null">（汇率取值通过核算参数控制）</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>组合币与币种一致，汇率</span><span>1</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>3</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>贷</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">If </span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">结算日</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易日</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">+1</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">核算项目</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">证券清算款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">else </span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">核算项目</span><span 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">If</span><span lang="en-US">未开启净应收</span><span lang="en-US">/</span><span lang="en-US">应付模式，</span><span>清算金额</span><span lang="null">；</span><span lang="en-US">else </span><span lang="en-US">取</span><span lang="en-US" style="vertical-align: 0pt; min-height: 10.5pt; margin-right: 0pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：股票买入、股票卖出、证券估值、证券结算</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 0);"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc32695"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.3</span><span>权证交易业务</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc29471"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.3.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">由中国结算上海分公司提供交易数据，经过清算处理后生产权证交易业务数据。数据处理暂定方案为成交金额、交易费用、交易佣金为港币金额，清算金额为人民币金额，因此维护的交易账户信息中结转现金账户为人民币账户。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 248pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc11656"></span><span lang="en-US" id="__RefHeading___Toc31661"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.3.7</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：权证买入、权证卖出、证券估值、证券结算</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc27128"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.4</span><span lang="en-US">理财</span><span>交易业务</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc20881"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.4.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">由中国结算上海分公司提供交易数据，经过清算处理后生产</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">港币</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">ETF</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">买卖</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易业务数据。数据处理暂定方案为成交金额、交易费用、交易佣金为港币金额，清算金额为人民币金额，因此维护的交易账户信息中结转现金账户为人民币账户。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span font-weight: normal;">用户接口</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><div id="__RefHeading___Toc10558"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.4.7</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.5</span><span lang="en-US">对价派息业务</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc11002"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.5.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">本功能处理股票分红派息，由于上市公司发生公司行为。包括现金红利和以股代息。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">全部以股代息，会产生零碎股现金。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc29017"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.5.2</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">用户接口</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 384.05pt; height: 237.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/a19eef1e-549f-4eb6-8da6-36701cff6544" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 384.05pt; height: 237.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: center;"><span lang="en-US">图</span><span lang="en-US">3.5.</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span lang="en-US">-1 </span><span lang="en-US">对价派息信息</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: center;"><span></span></p><div </span><span lang="en-US">对价派息业务</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span lang="en-US">以股代息</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc2361"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.5.3</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">HK_TZXX</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">），取红利相关的信息保存到</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">【</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对价派息信息】</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">。估值日等于</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">【</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对价派息信息】</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">中的除权日期，系统生成</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">【</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">对价派息业务】的“</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">分红派息</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">”</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">交易数据；证券有满足证券变动库</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">（</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">FSRQ=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">估值日、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">QYLB=HL</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">BDLX=00</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">G</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">且</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">CYBD</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">＜</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">0</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 10.5pt;">估值日</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">BDLX=180</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">条件，系统在原来</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt;">【</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">币种</span><span lang="en-US">1</span><span lang="en-US">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按权益金额确认收益，币种</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">分红币种，为空，则交易币种；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按实际股利收入确认收益，币种</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">分红币种，为空，则交易币种；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进汇兑损益</span><span lang="en-US">/</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进借方汇兑损益，币种无需考虑，金额为</span><span lang="en-US">0</span><span lang="en-US">，没有该分录；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">以结算币种确认红利收入，币种</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">结算币种，为空，则组合币种；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">原币</span><span lang="en-US">1</span><span lang="en-US">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按权益金额确认收益，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">3/</span><span lang="en-US">结算日汇率（币种</span><span lang="en-US">3/</span><span lang="en-US">组合币种）；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按实际股利收入确认收益，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">实际股利收入</span><span lang="en-US">-</span><span lang="en-US">权益金额；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进汇兑损益，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进借方汇兑损益，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">以结算币种确认红利收入，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">原币金额轧差；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">本币</span><span lang="en-US">1</span><span lang="en-US">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按权益金额确认收益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币金额轧差；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按实际股利收入确认收益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">原币金额</span><span lang="en-US">3*</span><span lang="en-US">结算日汇率（币种</span><span lang="en-US">3/</span><span lang="en-US">组合币种）；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进汇兑损益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进借方汇兑损益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">以结算币种确认红利收入，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币金额轧差；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">本币</span><span lang="en-US">2</span><span lang="en-US">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按权益金额确认收益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">按实际股利收入确认收益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币轧差金额；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进汇兑损益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币轧差金额；</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 42pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">轧差进借方汇兑损益，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">本币轧差金额；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US">参数“港股通分红派息跨币种结算特殊处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">以结算币种确认红利收入，本币金额</span><span lang="en-US">=0</span><span lang="en-US">。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="en-US"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-weight: bold;">结算日</span><span style="font-weight: bold;">+1</span><span style="font-weight: bold;">工作日：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>当“券结模式下港股通派息凭证处理模式”</span><span>=</span><span>延迟</span><span>1</span><span>工作日到账，生成以下凭证（参数值为</span><span class="docx_normal"><span lang="en-US"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc12231"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.5.6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：分红派息</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">业务、零碎股转现金、证券交易</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">结算</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc652"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.6</span><span lang="en-US">证券送配业务—送股</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc28934"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.6.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">本功能处理上市公司行为的股票送股</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc7787"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.6.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取证券送配相关的信息保存到权益信息表。估值日等于权益信息表中的除权日期，系统根据权益信息生成证券送配数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取证券变动库中的结算日期为估值日的送配信息，计算证券变动库中的送配数量与除权日的送配数量是否一致，如果不一致，新增一条送配数据，数量为差异数量。除权日：根据证券代码、送配权益信息中离结算日期最近的一个除权日。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 9.95pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc25649"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.6.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-13-0"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益信息</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 381.05pt; height: 227.3pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/5be8d1b5-e73b-4996-a806-299c1830376a" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 381.05pt; height: 227.3pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-13-0"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/1fd52204-9881-47da-b21f-4022c45c3a23" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc16301"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.6.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">除权日根据权益信息计算送配数量，到账日根据证券变动库中实际的证券变动数量再调整数量。</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.6.4.1</span><span style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">除权日</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">针对送股业务，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">送</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">B</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">场景下，流水中原币成本、本币成本不为</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">0</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">，除权日凭证</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">当核算参数【送股</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">送</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">B</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">成本不为</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">0</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">模式下凭证模板】</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">=</span><span lang="null" style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">冲减成本且</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">券为港股通通券</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">时：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;"></span></p><table style="width: 538.7pt; text-align: left; table-layout: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 0pt;"><span>原币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>本币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>币种为交易货币，汇率为估值汇率</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">备注：</span><span style="font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"> </span><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">参考文档《</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">V4.5</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">项目</span><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); min-height: 10.5pt; font-size: 10.5pt; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">针对送股业务，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">B</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">场景下，流水中原币成本、本币成本不为</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">0</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">，除权日凭证：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">当核算参数【送股</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">送</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">B</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">成本不为</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">0</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">模式下凭证模板】</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">= </span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">确认股利收入</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: inherit;">A</span><span style="font-family: Arial; font-style: normal; text-transform: none; font-variant: none; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt; background-color: inherit;">券为港股通通券</span><span border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0.01</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0.01</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>币种为交易货币</span></p></td></tr><tr><td colspan="8" style="border-width: 0.5pt;
