0pt;"><span>（</span><span>yyyy-mm-dd</span><span>）</span><span>[</span><span>交易方式</span><span>][</span><span>投资分类</span><span>][</span><span>证券代码</span><span>_</span><span>证券名称</span><span>]</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc8894"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.6.5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc25900"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.7</span><span>公司行为</span><span>_</span><span>公司收购</span><span> </span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc13938"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.7.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">本功能处理上市公司收购投资者股份的公司行为。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9887"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.7.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取公司收购相关的信息保存到权益信息表。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取结算明细库中清算日期为估值日的公司收购信息，根据证券代码、清算日期（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">QSRQ</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）大于权益信息表中登记日期最近的权益信息，取得该证券的权益类型；如果权益类型为“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购”或“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金加股份收购”，生成股票交易业务数据（交易方式为“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购”）；如果权益类型为“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股份收购”或“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金加股份收购”，生成证券转换的交易数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取证券变动库中发生日期为估值日的公司收购的变动数量，根据证券代码、业务类型查询小于发生日期最近的证券转换交易中，该证券代码的转入数量，比对变动数量与转入数量是否一致，如果不一致，提示“请手动调整</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">XXXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">日证券转换交易中</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">XXXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券的转入数量”。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc24838"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.7.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益信息</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 383.2pt; height: 227.3pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/e6e93c58-56d6-4fda-86c5-047a8c41626b" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 383.2pt; height: 227.3pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">送配类型中增加</span><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购”、“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股份收购”、“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金加股份收购”。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451.05pt; height: 277.85pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/67a1a1b1-ffc1-4692-96b0-05d89147c33a" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451.05pt; height: 277.85pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易方式中增加“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购”。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股份收购</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451.05pt; height: 342.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/e3f27c0b-4043-41a0-875c-e25542fbe41a" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451.05pt; height: 342.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">转换类型中增加“港股通</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股份收购”。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc11323"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.7.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">凭证处理</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购类似股票</span><span lang="null" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">理财</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">卖出；股份收购类似被收购股份卖出；现金加股份收购，分拆为现金收购、股份收购两种交易数据。</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.7.4.1</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现金收购</span></p><table style="width: 538.7pt; text-align: left; table-layout: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 106.3pt;"><col style="width: 49.65pt;"><col style="width: 35.4pt;"><col style="width: 78pt;"><col style="width: 63.75pt;"><col style="width: 134.7pt;"></colgroup><tbody><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>序号</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>借贷</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>核算项目</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>币种</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>数量</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>原币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>本币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>备注</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>1</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>2</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>贷</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>证券清算款</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>人民币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>原币</span><span>1</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>本币</span><span>1</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p></td></tr><tr><td colspan="8" style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>（</span><span>yyyy-mm-dd</span><span>）</span><span>[</span><span>证券结算</span><span>][</span><span>证券品种</span><span>][</span><span>证券代码</span><span>_</span><span>证券名称</span><span>]</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 0, 0);"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc18896"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.7.5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：公司现金收购、证券转换</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc26658"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.8</span><span>公司行为</span><span>_</span><span>分拆与合并</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc2541"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.8.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">本功能处理公司分拆与合并的公司行为，先转为临时代码，再转为新代码，新代码与原代码相同。</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2014</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">年</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">11</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">月份为止，系统暂定实现为方案二</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 429.85pt; height: 262.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/983b229a-88cd-46d2-affa-b3da26c47c18" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 429.85pt; height: 262.45pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc18552"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.8.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">有两种处理方式：方式一，按照证券转换的方式处理，原代码转换为临时代码，临时代码转为新代码；方式二，按照证券送配的方式处理，调整原代码的数量。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">方式一：读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取拆分合并相关的信息保存到权益信息表。估值日等于单柜交易首日，系统生成原代码转换为临时代码证券转换数据；估值日等于并柜交易首日，系统生成临时代码转换为新代码证券转换数据；估值日等于新代码交易首日，系统再次生成临时代码转换为新代码证券转换数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">方式二：读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取拆分合并相关的信息保存到权益信息表。估值日等于单柜交易首日，系统读取其他数量文件，计算原代码的调整数量，生成证券送配数据；估值日等于单柜交易第二个工作日，读取证券变动库的变动数量，与前一工作日的调整数量比对，不一致，生成修正数量的证券送配数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">方式二中做估增时，在单柜期要根据原代码找到对应的临时代码的证券行情做估增；在并柜期和新代码期，根据原代码找到对应的新代码（与原代码相同）的证券行情做估增。单柜期和并柜期，交易数据中的临时代码要转为对应的原代码证券。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">现在系统分拆合同处理的整个流程：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">①</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK_TZXX</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取拆分合并相关的信息保存到权益信息表，主要目的是获取原代码和临时代码的关联关系；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">②</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日等于单柜交易首日，系统读取其他数量文件，计算原代码的调整数量，生成证券送配数据，送配数量计算：【证券其他数量对账文件】中的</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">SL1</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（即【可交易额度】）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日上一日的【证券代码】的持仓数量</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">+</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日对应证券的买入数量合计</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日对应证券的卖出数量合计；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">③</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日等于单柜交易第二个工作日，读取证券变动库（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">hk_zqbd)</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的变动数量，与前一工作日的调整数量比对，不一致，生成修正数量的证券送配数据。</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">#</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">由于中登的精确算法</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，与单柜交易日计算结果会有差额，因此生成调整数据，调整数量</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=CYBD</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">BDLX=181</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，为分拆合并）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">上一工作日分拆合并送配数据的数量；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">④</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">单柜交易区间读取结算明细（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">hk_jsmx</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）清算时将临时代码全部转成原代码（通过送配信息关联），并且在估值时，原代码生成估值汇率行情时，获取临时代码的公共行情生成估值汇率行情；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">⑤</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">单柜交易末日（并柜交易首日前一工作日）日终，中登会将临时代码转成新代码（新代码与原代码一致），估值系统一直是原代码（新代码）处理的，因此该日无需特殊处理；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">⑥</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">并柜交易区间，市面上交易有新代码（即原代码）和临时代码并行交易，此时估值系统读取结算明细（</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">hk_jsmx</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）时，清算时将临时代码的交易全部转成原代码生成交易流水，并且以新代码估值，此段时间，中登给出的行情中，既有新代码又有临时代码，因此估值时，直接以新代码估值，无需特殊处理；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">⑦</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">并柜交易末日日终，中登会将临时代码全部转成新代码，估值系统已经全部为新代码，无需特殊处理；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.25; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: justify;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">⑧</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">新代码单柜交易期，分拆合并过程结束，完全以新代码（与原代码一致）交易、估值；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc4734"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.8.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益信息</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 383.2pt; height: 227.3pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/a13f71a5-6bce-4486-b51a-9bbf92295a88" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 383.2pt; height: 227.3pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券转换（方式一）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 450.7pt; height: 342.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/2a6b00fb-fc83-432c-9c0a-4b57a6d5b6a0" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 450.7pt; height: 342.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配（方式二）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/86bbb992-938a-477a-9f69-1ab894f2b462" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc3879"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.8.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">凭证处理</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.8.4.1</span><span style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券转换凭证</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">：</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">单柜交易首日（</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">T</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">日）</span></p><table style="width: 538.7pt; text-align: left; table-layout: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 106.3pt;"><col style="width: 49.65pt;"><col style="width: 35.4pt;"><col style="width: 78pt;"><col style="width: 63.75pt;"><col style="width: 134.7pt;"></colgroup><tbody><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>序号</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>借贷</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>核算项目</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>币种</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>数量</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>港币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0.01</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.8.4.5</span><span style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配凭证</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0.01</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0.01</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>币种为交易货币</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc1518"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.8.5</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：证券转换、证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9349"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.9</span><span>公司行为</span><span>_</span><span>供股</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9317"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.9.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">本功能处理公司行为中的供股。供股流程分为供股登记；供股权派发、交易、申报和缴款；以及供股上市三个阶段。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451.1pt; height: 268.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/14caff4a-06c0-4833-9327-baf93c3f690a" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451.1pt; height: 268.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">供股权证可以上市交易，由于受港股通规则的限制，大陆投资者可以行权，可以卖出，但不能买入，也不能超额行权，供股权证每个港股通交易日要估值。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9350"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.9.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取供股相关的信息保存到权益信息表。估值日等于权益信息表中的除权日期，系统根据权益信息生成证券送配（股票送供股权证）数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取证券变动库中的结算日期为估值日且变动类型（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">BDLX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">‘</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">00G</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">’</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的信息，计算证券变动库中的送配数量与除权日的送配数量是否一致，如果不一致，新增一条送配数据，数量为差异数量。除权日的取数：根据证券代码、送配权益信息中离结算日期最近的一个除权日。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取结算明细中清算日期为估值日且业务类型（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">YWLX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=H65</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的供股清算数据，根据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM1</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">查询权益信息中最近的权证送配信息中的送配权证，</span><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">生成送配权证的行权（实物结算）交易数据，股票发行方式为未上市。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">供股权证在除权日至申报截止日估值增值，如有行情：金额</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">行情</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">成本</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估增库存余额，如果供股权证无行情：金额</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=MAX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（标的券行情收市价</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">每股供股价，</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">0</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">库存数量</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估增库存余额。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">上市流通日</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">,</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">生成证券上市流通的数据。</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 11pt; font-size: 11pt;">获</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">取证券变动库中</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">FSRQ</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">等于估值日、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">BDLX=00G</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQLB=PT</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的数据中的</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，如果</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">存在于通知信息库（估值日期</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">&gt;RQ3</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">且通知类别</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">TZLB=H14</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，</span><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日为上市流通日。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc11472"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.9.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益信息</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 382.55pt; height: 225.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/74cc3f67-545e-4f0c-b123-be558cc544de" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 382.55pt; height: 225.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/0788dc41-08ae-4389-92cd-6ce2d0d7e7e6" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权证转换</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（虚拟或者临时代码转</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">成</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">正式代码）</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 10pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451.05pt; height: 341.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/d5a6735d-16ae-437a-98f3-90f4bffb779f" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451.05pt; height: 341.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">4</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权证行权（实物结算）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 426.1pt; height: 306.3pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/0aed046e-6f87-4aad-966c-49507d9dc437" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 426.1pt; height: 306.3pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">5</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券流通</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 450.75pt; height: 184.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/fc78a391-dce6-4b3a-ac64-af3a18513ae4" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 450.75pt; height: 184.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="margin: 6pt 0pt 6pt 71.5pt; text-indent: -36pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc8733"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: bold; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.9.4</span><span lang="en-US">核算综合参数</span></p><table style="width: 435.4pt; table-layout: auto; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 116.55pt;"><col style="width: 137.75pt;"><col style="width: 181.1pt;"></colgroup><tbody><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; lang="en-US">=I9</span><span lang="en-US">核算项目（衍生工具类），走衍生工具科目，否则走证券投资科目</span></p></td></tr><tr><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>4</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>贷</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>证券投资</span><span>_</span><span>公允价值</span><span lang="en-US">/</span><span lang="en-US">衍生工具</span><span lang="en-US">_</span><span lang="en-US">公允价值</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>港币</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>0</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">证券品种</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span lang="en-US">权证</span><span lang="en-US">%</span><span lang="en-US">，核算参数“权证业务核算会计科目账务处理”</span><span lang="en-US">=I9</span><span lang="en-US">核算项目（衍生工具类），走衍生工具科目，否则走证券投资科目</span></p></td></tr><tr><td colspan="8" style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(242, 242, 242); padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>（</span><span>yyyy-mm-dd</span><span>）</span><span>[</span><span>交易方式</span><span>][</span><span>投资分类</span><span>][</span><span>证券代码</span><span>_</span><span>证券名称</span><span>]</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc15091"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.9.6</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：证券送配、权证行权、证券流通</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc29131"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.10</span><span>公司行为</span><span>_</span><span>配股</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc9640"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.10.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">本功能处理公司行为中的配股业务，与供股类似，但是配股的</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">供股权证不可以上市交易</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc6998"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.10.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取最新通知信息（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">HK</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_TZXX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">），取配股相关的信息保存到权益信息表。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">读取结算明细中清算日期为估值日且业务类型（</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">YWLX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=H64</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的配股清算数据，根据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM1</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">查询权益信息中最近的权证送配信息中的送配权证，</span><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">生成送配权证的行权（实物结算）交易数据，股票发行方式为未上市。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">上市流通日</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">,</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">生成证券上市流通的数据。</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 11pt; font-size: 11pt;">获</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">取证券变动库中</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">FSRQ</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">等于估值日、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">BDLX=00G</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQLB=PT</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的数据中的</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，如果</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">存在于通知信息库（估值日期</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">&gt;RQ3</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">且通知类别</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">TZLB=H13</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">的）</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">ZQDM</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，</span><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"> </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估值日为上市流通日。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc30511"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.10.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">1</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益信息</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 382.55pt; height: 225.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/e67b3389-e75d-4d7d-a33f-5af7ebb35444" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 382.55pt; height: 225.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权证转换</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（虚拟或者临时代码转</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">成</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">正式代码）</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 451.05pt; height: 341.7pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/dc833b04-da49-4cf6-a49f-f530049b5caf" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 451.05pt; height: 341.7pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券送配</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/144f7e45-3744-4a3c-8fa6-34b60358106d" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 432.05pt; height: 272.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">4</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交易数据</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">_</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权证行权（实物结算）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 426.1pt; height: 306.3pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/832e1627-65d1-4f3d-b154-9591c05c8908" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 426.1pt; height: 306.3pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">5</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券流通</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 450.75pt; height: 184.65pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/b2aa4f89-5fa0-429c-b95a-441686ab0b46" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 450.75pt; height: 184.65pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc6892"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.10.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">凭证处理</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.10.4.1</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">配股业务</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 52.05pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-weight: bold;">除权日在缴款截止日之后的模式</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">      </span><span>此种模式在除权日获得股票投资，并不需要确认权证投资。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">       </span><span>&lt;1&gt;</span><span>业务处理说明：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US">一、</span><span>配股除权日在配股截止日之后</span><span lang="null">（</span><span>配股业务除权日大于缴款截止日核算处理</span><span lang="en-US">=2.</span><span lang="en-US">不区分交易市场</span><span lang="null">）</span><span>：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-27-0" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="OLE_LINK1"></span><span>当核算综合参数“配股业务核算项目”</span><span>=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">“</span><span>1.</span><span>证券清算款非</span><span>T+1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">”“</span><span>其他应收款”，做以下凭证</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="OLE_LINK1"></span><span>1</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股缴款日期</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">     </span><span>借：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>非</span><span>T+1/</span><span>其他应收款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">       </span><span>贷：证券清算款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: -26.25pt; margin-left: 88.2pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>2</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股缴款清算日（上海为配股截止日的次一个交易日，深圳为配股申报日的次一交易日）：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>借：证券清算款</span><span><span> </span></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">     </span><span>贷：结算备付金</span><span>—</span><span>XX</span><span>交易所结算备付金</span><span><span> </span></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 61.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>3</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股除权日（配股公告中确定的除权日）：</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>借：股票投资</span><span>—</span><span>未流通新股</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">         </span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">     </span><span>贷：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>非</span><span>T+1 /</span><span>其他应收款</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">   </span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-28-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>当核算综合参数“配股业务核算项目”</span><span>=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">“</span><span>0. </span><span>证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>新股”，</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-28-0" style="text-indent: -21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>做以下凭证</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; color: rgb(255, 0, 0);">  </span><span>1</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股缴款日期</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>（配股业务流水中的结算日期）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">     </span><span>借：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>新股</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">       </span><span>贷：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>非</span><span>T+1/</span><span>证券清算款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>#</span><span>若“上交所配股业务申请日是否制作凭证</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>”</span><span>=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span>否’，则上交所配股不做上述凭证；否则，做上述凭证；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>若</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">“配股是否过证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1”=‘</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">否’，</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">或结算日期</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">实际结算日期前一工作日，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">则贷方科目为：证券清算款，否则为证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: -26.25pt; margin-left: 88.2pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>2</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股缴款清算日前一个工作日（实际结算日期前一个工作日）：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>借：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>非</span><span>T+1</span><span><span> </span></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">     </span><span>贷：</span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">证券清算款</span><span><span> </span></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;">            </span><span>#</span><span>若</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">“配股是否过证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1”=‘</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">否’，</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">或结算日期</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">实际结算日期前一工作日，或</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">结算日期</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">实际结算日期，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">则不做上述凭证，否则，做上述凭证；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">            </span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">、配股缴款截止日次一个工作日</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">                 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">借：证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">新股</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">                 </span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">贷：证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1/</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">证券清算款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>#</span><span>若“上交所配股业务申请日是否制作凭证</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>”</span><span>=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">‘</span><span>否’，则上交所配股做上述凭证；否则，不做上述凭证；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 42pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span>若</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">“配股是否过证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1”=‘</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">否’，则贷方科目为：证券清算款，否则为证券清算款</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">_</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);"></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: -26.25pt; margin-left: 88.2pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>4</span><span>、配股缴款清算日（配股业务流水中实际结算日期）：</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 61.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">  </span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">（</span><span lang="null" style="font-family: 宋体; color: 255, 255);">非</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">T+1</span><span lang="en-US" style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 61.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Arial; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">         </span><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">贷：银行存款</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 61.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">#</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; color: rgb(255, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">实际结算日的交收凭证受参数“社保资产交易所证券结算规则”控制，和其他的交易类结算凭证轧差结算，只制作一张凭证；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 61.95pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span>5</span><span>、</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>配股除权日（配股公告中确定的除权日，配股业务流水中的除权日）：</span><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-left: 63pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial;"> </span><span>借：股票投资</span><span>—</span><span>未流通新股</span><span </span><span>贷：证券清算款</span><span>_</span><span>新股</span><span style="font-family: Arial;">  </span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span></span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="null">港股通特殊处理：</span><span lang="null">核算参数“港股通业务成本及估增核算原币币种”</span><span lang="en-US">=</span><span 0pt;"><span>（</span><span>yyyy-mm-dd</span><span>）</span><span>[</span><span>证券库存估值</span><span>][</span><span>投资分类</span><span>][</span><span>证券代码</span><span>_</span><span>证券名称</span><span>]</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">如果配股权证有行情：原币金额</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">行情</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">成本</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估增库存余额</span><span lang="null" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">如果配股权证无行情：</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">当“</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">港股供股权证无行情时的行情价格获取方式</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">”参数值为“标的券价格计算估值”，</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">原币金额</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=MAX</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（标的券行情收市价</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">每股供股价，</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">0</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">）</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">行权比例</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">库存数量</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估增库存余额。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">当“</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">港股供股权证无行情时的行情价格获取方式</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">”参数值为“除权价计算估值”且当日无行情</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">and</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">当日为供股除权日时，原币金额</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">（股权登记日股票收盘价</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股票除权价）</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">/</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益比例</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">库存数量</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">-</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">估增库存余额，其中股票除权价</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=(</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">股权除权日前一日股票收盘价</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">+</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">认购价</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益比例</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">)/(1+</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">权益比例</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">)</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，否则取公共行情或者前一日估值汇率行情</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">；</span></p><p class="docx_heading4 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -43.2pt; margin-left: 43.2pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 黑体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3.10.4.8</span><span lang="null" style="font-weight: normal; min-height: 12pt; 12pt;">凭证查询：证券送配、权证行权、证券流通</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc15635"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.11</span><span>证券组合费</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc26747"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.11.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">证券组合费：证券组合费</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">=</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">市值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">*</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">天数</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">×</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">费率</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">/365</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">，实行阶梯费率、分段计算，按自然日计算，结果四舍五入，精确至</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">位小数。由中国结算上海分公司提供数据。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc1979"></span><span lang="en-US" 0pt;"><span>（</span><span>yyyy-mm-dd</span><span>）</span><span>[</span><span>收支项目</span><span>][</span><span>描述</span><span>]</span></p></td></tr></tbody></table><p class="docx_normal"
