margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc20409"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.11.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：收支结转</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -28.35pt; margin-left: 28.35pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc17746"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-weight: bold; min-height: 16pt; font-size: 16pt;">3.12</span><span>风控资金业务（待定）</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">原因：中登按照结算参与人提供该数据，因此无法处理。等通过托管行拆分或者券商柜台。</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc19226"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.12.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">功能概述</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-15-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">风控资金的缴纳</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-24-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">境内参与人需新开风控资金账户，用于存放风控资金，按月结息。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-21-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">以备付金账户为单位，以人民币缴纳。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-29-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">T</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">日日终清算，</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">T+1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">日</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">10</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">：</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">30</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交收。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-33-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">交收时从备付金账户中扣收风控资金，存入风控资金账户。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-19-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">先返还上日应收风控资金，再扣收当日应收资金。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-36-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">风控资金的计算</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-24-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">计收差额缴款、按金。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-24-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">暂不收取集中抵押金，但保留收取的权利。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-24-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">风控资金的计算原理大致参照香港结算计算方法，但略有调整。</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-18-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">其他</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-24-0" style="line-height: 1.5; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">需缴纳</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">20</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">万结算保证金。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1.5; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc2616"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.12.2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输入要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN" style="font-family: Arial;">   </span><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 431.95pt; height: 268.9pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/c56a295c-c9ac-4f52-9292-b9e1c4a93ac3" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 431.95pt; height: 268.9pt;"></div><p></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN">备注：在资产清算数据中直接处理成人民币币种与金额</span></p><p class="docx_heading3 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: -71.5pt; margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc3820"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.12.3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">处理流程</span></p><table style="width: 538.7pt; text-align: left; table-layout: auto;"><colgroup><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: 35.45pt;"><col style="width: margin-left: 71.5pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc24663"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal; min-height: 14pt; font-size: 14pt;">3.12.4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: normal;">输出要素</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">凭证查询：资金汇划业务</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: 宋体; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;"></span></p></article><footer style="margin-bottom: calc(-29.8667px); min-height: calc(29.8667px);"><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN">[</span><span lang="zh-CN">键入文字</span><span lang="zh-CN">]</span></p><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: right;"><span></span></p></footer></section><section class="docx" style="padding: 72pt; min-height: 841.9pt;"><header style="margin-top: calc(-39.2667px); min-height: calc(39.2667px);"><p class="docx_header"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/18fc7abe-967d-45eb-9bc9-c57640c2855e" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"></div><span style="font-family: Arial;">                         </span><span>业务需求分析过程</span><p></p></header><article><p class="docx_heading1 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc7280"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; min-height: 22pt; font-size: 22pt;">4</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; min-height: 22pt; font-size: 22pt;">.</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">待定问题</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">1</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、估值汇率未定；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：已确定为当</span><span lang="en-US" style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">日</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">买入与卖出汇率平均值</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">2</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、券商佣金算法未定，同时交易费用承担方式未定，哪些费用由券商承担未定；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：可按照参数，佣金算法有成交明细、申请编号、成交汇总等实现；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">3</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、买卖中由于汇率保留位数，导致尾差扎到哪个核算项目未定；</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">(</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">到其他费用</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">)</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：扎差到其他费用</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">4</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、风险资金业务未定，由于上中登按照结算参与人给以汇总数据，因此需要有券商柜台或者托管行采用清算拆分后方可定。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：等托管行提供二级清算接口，方可处理</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">5</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、合并与拆分，涉及到临时代码段问题，这期间涉及到行情怎么提供，买卖使用哪个代码未确定。</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：统一采用正式代码来替换临时代码</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">6</span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">、佣金中汇率未定；</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="text-indent: 24pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: Arial; min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">   </span><span style="min-height: 12pt; font-size: 12pt;">回复：使用单笔买卖的交易汇率</span></p><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: 1; text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: left;"><span lang="zh-CN"></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 431.95pt; height: 236.8pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/8f34bfae-0895-4e86-a6e0-d6a2bc5a1458" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 431.95pt; height: 236.8pt;"></div><p></p></article><footer style="margin-bottom: calc(-29.8667px); min-height: calc(29.8667px);"><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span lang="zh-CN">[</span><span lang="zh-CN">键入文字</span><span lang="zh-CN">]</span></p><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt; text-align: right;"><span></span></p></footer></section><section class="docx" style="padding: 72pt; min-height: 841.9pt;"><header style="margin-top: calc(-39.2667px); min-height: calc(39.2667px);"><p class="docx_header"><span></span></p><div style="display: inline-block; position: relative; text-indent: 0px; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"><img src="blob:http://localhost:8000/243a3f8d-5f14-4b69-bcb0-4abcaa9d9298" style="position: relative; left: 0pt; top: 0pt; width: 225.05pt; height: 22.45pt;"></div><span style="font-family: Arial;">                         </span><span>业务需求分析过程</span><p></p></header><article><p class="docx_heading1 docx-num-0-0" style="margin: 0pt; line-height: 1; text-indent: 0pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc10820"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">6</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">.</span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">其他规则</span></p><p class="docx_heading2 docx-num-0-0" style="text-indent: 0pt; margin-left: 0pt; margin-right: 10.5pt;"><span id="__RefHeading___Toc219"></span><span lang="en-US" style="font-family: 宋体;">6.1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">汇率取值</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">先根据中国节假日群</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">CN</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">以及香港节假日群</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">HK</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">判断；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、若都为工作日，则为共同开市日；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、若都为节假日，则为共同节假日；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、若中国节假日群为工作日，香港节假日群为节假日，则为大陆单独开市日；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、若中国节假日群为节假日，香港节假日群为工作日，则为香港单独开市日；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">每日估值时需获取组合关联的【汇率转换方案】、【节假日群设置】以及核算参数【港股通业务香港单独开市估值汇率取值】、【港股通业务大陆单独开市估值汇率取值】设置；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">1</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">）若估值日期为共同开市日，则取【汇率行情资料】中行情日期≤估值日期的最近一日汇率行情；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">2</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">）若估值日期为共同节假日，则受【汇率转换方案】中</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">节假日处理</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">逻辑控制；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">A</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、节假日处理</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取最近一日私有汇率行情</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，则取组合最近一日私有汇率行情（【估值汇率行情】</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">-</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">【汇率行情】）；&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">B</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、节假日处理</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取当日最近公共汇率行情</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">或为空，则取【汇率行情资料】中行情日期≤估值日期的最近一日汇率行情；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">3</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">）若估值日期为香港单独开市日，则受核算参数【港股通业务香港单独开市估值汇率取值】控制；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">A</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取当日汇率</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，则取【汇率行情资料】中行情日期≤估值日期的最近一自然日汇率行情；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">B</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取前一日汇率（香港节假日群）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，取【汇率行情资料】中估值日期前一工作日汇率行情（节假日判断用香港节假日群）；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">C</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取前一日汇率（港股通节假日群）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，取【汇率行情资料】中估值日期前一工作日汇率行情（节假日判断用港股通节假日群）；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;"> </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">4</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">）若估值日期为大陆单独开市日，则受核算参数【港股通业务大陆单独开市估值汇率取值】控制；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">A</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取当日汇率</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，则取【汇率行情资料】中行情日期≤估值日期的最近一自然日汇率行情；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">B</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取前一日汇率（香港节假日群）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，取【汇率行情资料】中估值日期前一工作日汇率行情（节假日判断用香港节假日群）；</span></p><p class="docx_normal"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">     </span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">C</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">、参数值</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">="</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">取前一日汇率（港股通节假日群）</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">"</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">，取【汇率行情资料】中估值日期前一工作日汇率行情（节假日判断用港股通节假日群））；</span></p></article><footer style="margin-bottom: calc(-29.8667px); min-height: calc(29.8667px);"><p class="docx_footer" style="text-indent: 18pt; 宋体;">2014-12-10</span></p></td></tr><tr style="height: 28.35pt;"><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; border-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); vertical-align: middle; padding: 0pt 5.4pt;"><p class="docx_normal" style="line-height: calc(100% + 0px); text-indent: 21pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">V0.7</span></p></td><td style="border-width: 0.5pt; border-style: solid; 宋体;">修改</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">：</span></p><p class="docx_normal docx-num-25-0" style="line-height: calc(100% + 0px); text-indent: -18pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-right: 0pt;"><span style="font-family: 宋体;">对于</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">3.7</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">对价</span><span style="font-family: 宋体;">派息部分，</span><span style="font-family:
